overview:
Jaime holds the position of Chief Technology Officer and Cofounder of Mentez, a global company that helps other firms position their brands in social networks, creating unique marketing solutions and business models through the promotion and development of web applications. Creators of Paymentez, leader monetization platform for online games in Brazil.

Prior to joining Mentez, Jaime was also CTO at MGM International and MGM Innova, two of the most recognized global project development companies and providers of integrated low carbon solutions with focus in the development of emission reduction projects and programs under the Kyoto Protocol, Voluntary and Pre-Compliance Markets.

Jaime also worked for Vida18, a leading software development company serving the flower industry. He was one of the creators of Vidaflowers, a complete management solution for the fresh flowers business and FTDFlowerExchange.com a flower buying platform designed to provide floral purchasing solutions for FTD Members. Other important developments he managed included Comercio.com a C2C sales and auctions portal, and Todoplasticos.com, a B2B auction platform for the plastics and resins industry.
